{{also|hunger}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|hunger}}, from {{inh|de|goh|hungar}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*hungruz}}, from Proto-Indo-European *kenk- (“to burn, smart, desire, hunger, thirst”).
